# Installation

npm install superbvue --save
// or
yarn add --dev superbvue

# Usage

import { createApp } from 'vue'
import { SBButton } from 'superbvue'

const app = createApp(App)

app.component('SBButton', SBButton)

<SBButton></SBButton>
